name: Step 1: Gather your learning concepts
definition: Make a list of all the concepts, terms, or formulas you need to learn. Think about key topics from lectures, textbooks, or your notes.

name: Step 2: Copy the ChatGPT prompt
definition: Paste your list of concepts into the text area and click 'Copy ChatGPT Prompt'. The app will format it properly for AI processing.

name: Step 3: Use ChatGPT to format your concepts
definition: Go to chat.openai.com, paste the prompt, and wait for ChatGPT to return your list formatted as JSON. This converts your raw list into a structured format.

name: Step 4: Paste the JSON into Studicious
definition: Copy the entire JSON output from ChatGPT and paste it into the 'Paste the ChatGPT JSON' text area. Click 'Process JSON' to load your concepts.

name: Step 5: Review and customize your concepts
definition: Check each concept definition for accuracy. Uncheck any concepts you already know well - they won't appear in your final study guide.

name: Step 6: Adjust PDF settings
definition: Customize your PDF by adjusting font sizes, spacing, and other formatting options to create a study guide that works best for you.

name: Step 7: Generate your study guide
definition: Click the 'Generate PDF' button to preview your study guide. Review it to make sure everything looks right.

name: Step 8: Download and study
definition: Once you're happy with your study guide, click 'Download PDF' to save it. Print it out or keep it on your device for efficient studying!
